item.description:
Hi Everyone, I am going to see my friend’s band (Slapback) play at McGann’s Pub so I thought I’d make it a meetup – Hope you can join us, they are a great band!

The Band:Slapback

http://www.reverbnation.com/slapbackband

The Place: McGann's Pub

http://www.mcgannsirishpub.com/

The Cost: The cover charge is $10. You can buy an advance ‘ticket’ on-line for $5 by clicking on the following link. Basically you will pay $5 on-line and your name is put on the guest list that will be at the door. I would suggest printing and bringing your receipt.
The event is called "UR Presents The Townies CD Release".

http://www.unregularradio.com/local-music-tickets

The Details: Slapback is set to go on at 9pm and then there are a couple of other bands to follow. I will be there by 8:30pm.

Other Bands Following Slapback:

              The Townies

               People's Party

               Tall Boys

** Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVER. **
item.how_to_find_us: I have never been to this place before. I will try to let the hostess or bartender know where we will be.
item.name: McGann's Pub - 197 Portland Street, Boston: Local Live Bands
